pmhalMpuLprmHgRampParams Struct Reference
Infrastructure and Domain List

Structure to capture the MPU LPRM Mercury Retention parameters. More...

#include <pmhal_mpu_lprm.h>

Data Fields

uint8_t hgRampType
 
uint8_t hgSlowRampTime
 

Detailed Description

Structure to capture the MPU LPRM Mercury Retention parameters.

Field Documentation

uint8_t pmhalMpuLprmHgRampParams::hgRampType

Indicates the type of the ramp, 0 - Slow Ramp up, 1 - Fast Ramp up

uint8_t pmhalMpuLprmHgRampParams::hgSlowRampTime

The value set in this field determines the slow ramp-up time and the duration (number of cycles) of the PONOUTHG to PGOODINHG (transition for power domain without DPS). The duration is computed as 8 x hgSlowRampTime of system clock cycles.
